full_summary:
## Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Solicitation
### English
 TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS)
#### Reference number: cb-56-67897051
#### Solicitation number: 202500016/A
#### Tender closing date: 2024-12-02T14:00:00
#### Expected contract start date: 2025-04-01
#### Expected contract end date: 2026-03-31
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of qualified Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Holders to provide Technical Services for the transformation of the RCMP’s website environment and support the RCMP’s existing web initiatives.

### Procurement Details
- The procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
- This procurement is open only to Tier 1 Indigenous TBIPS SA Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Level 2, Web Developer, and in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs.
- The procurement requires the services of two Web Developers (Level 2) to support the RCMP’s transformation of its website environment and help with existing web initiatives.
- Bidders may submit a bid for all resource categories.
- The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.

### Requirements
- The required services must meet the security requirements as outlined in SRCL103747.
- The Minimum Corporate Security Required is Designated Organization Screening (DOS).
- The Minimum Resource Security Required is Enhanced Reliability.

### Contact
For more information or to request the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents, please contact Connie Wright at:

- Phone: 613-791-9647
- Email: Connie.Wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

Please note that the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

### Note
- The Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year.
- If you wish to find out how you can become a “Qualified SA Holder”, please contact RCNMDAI.-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca

> Kenneddy Rios Sherlock
> Contract Manager
> kriossherlock@toyonconsulting.com
> 514-123-4567
> [227-237vette EST
